hostent Record

Summary

Represents type hostent.

Namespace: flcSocketLibSys
Syntax
Delphi
type
 hostent = record
 case Byte of
 0 : (h_addr_list : ^PAnsiChar);
 1 : (h_addr : ^PAnsiChar);
 end;
